title: This 775 sq ft 1 bed, 1 bath is impressive!
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 775 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1710 -
